links.title: Text Extraction Examples | adbar/trafilatura | DeepWiki
links.description: Theextract() function intrafilatura/core.py 100-184 serves as the primary entry point, accepting multiple parameters to control extraction behavior. The function returns plain text by default but supports multiple output formats through the output_format parameter.

links.title: trafilatura/trafilatura/core.py at master · adbar/trafilatura · GitHub
links.description: Args: filecontent: HTML code as string. url: URL of the webpage. record_id: Add an ID to the metadata. fast: Use faster heuristics and skip backup extraction. no_fallback: Will be deprecated, use "fast" instead.favor_precision: prefer less text but correct extraction. favor_recall: when unsure, prefer more text.include_comments:Extract...

links.title: datatrove/src/datatrove/pipeline/extractors/trafilatura.py at main ...
links.description: No specific data structure is exchanged withTrafilatura, only the text is passed and the extracted text is returned. Alternatively and identically, `trafilatura` could be used through its command line main interface.

links.title: Trafilatura Web Extraction - PraisonAI
links.description: OverviewTrafilaturais a Python library and command-line tool designed toextractmeaningful content from web pages. It focuses on main text extraction, metadata parsing, and content quality assessment, making it ideal for creating clean datasets from web sources.
